General.Name: Qualigen Therapeutics Inc
General.Description: Qualigen Therapeutics, Inc., a clinical-stage therapeutics company, focuses on the development and commercialization of treatments for adult and pediatric cancer in the United States. The company's lead program is QN-302, an investigational small molecule G-quadruplexes (G4)-selective transcription inhibitor, which is in Phase 1a clinical trial for the treatment of pancreatic cancer and other solid tumors. It is also developing Pan-RAS that is in preclinical stage for the treatment of advanced solid tumors. Qualigen Therapeutics, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in Carlsbad, California.
General.Address: 5857 Owens Avenue, Carlsbad, CA, United States, 92008
